Get a single person's movie or show credits

Source: R/trakt-people.R
people_media.Rd

Returns all movies or shows where this person is in the cast or crew.

trakt.people.movies(target, extended = c("min", "full"))

trakt.people.shows(target, extended = c("min", "full"))

Arguments

target

character(1): The ID of the item requested. Preferably the Trakt ID (e.g. 1390), slug (e.g. "game-of-thrones"), or IMDb ID (e.g. "tt0944947"). Can also be of length greater than 1, in which case the function is called on all target values separately and the result is combined.
extended

character(1): Either "min" (API default) or "full". The latter returns more variables and should generally only be used if required.

Value

A list of one or more tibbles for cast and crew. The latter tibble objects are as flat as possible.

See also

media_people, for the other direction: Media that has people.

Other people data: media_people, trakt.people.summary

Examples

trakt.people.movies("christopher-nolan")
#> $cast
#> # A tibble: 15 x 7
#>    character title                 year trakt  slug                  imdb  tmdb 
#>    <chr>     <chr>                <int> <chr>  <chr>                 <chr> <chr>
#>  1 himself   The Making of Dunki…  2017 399062 the-making-of-dunkir… tt77… 5491…
#>  2 ""        Cinema Futures        2016 285889 cinema-futures-2016   tt60… 4168…

#>  7 Himself   The Fire Rises: The…  2013 148113 the-fire-rises-the-c… tt31… 2432…
#>  8 Himself   Side by Side          2012 77846  side-by-side-2012     tt20… 1103…
#>  9 Himself   The Batmobile         2012 86120  the-batmobile-2012    tt22… 1252…

#> 11 Himself   Exploring The Tree …  2011 189583 exploring-the-tree-o… tt21… 2927…

trakt.people.shows("kit-harington")
#> $cast
#> # A tibble: 2 x 8
#>   title           year trakt  slug           tvdb   imdb     tmdb  character    
#>   <chr>          <int> <chr>  <chr>          <chr>  <chr>    <chr> <chr>        
#> 1 Gunpowder       2017 123241 gunpowder      334069 tt61282… 73550 Robert Cates…
#> 2 Game of Thron…  2011 1390   game-of-thron… 121361 tt09449… 1399  Jon Snow     
#>
